programme.desc: South West Pacific - Martin climbs an active volcano in Vanuatu, and in Tonga meets a third gender leiti and a princess. In Fiji he visits a tribe tricked out of their homeland by a British mining company.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Florida Keys National Marine Sanctuary - This episode examines the importance of three marine habitat types in the Florida Keys including the animals within them and conservationists’ efforts to protect them.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Christmas Island - Christmas Island, over a thousand kilometres northwest of Australia’s mainland, is a speck of an island that rises out of the Indian Ocean, a tiny refuge to plants and creatures found nowhere else in the world. Birds rule its skies and it’s stunning landscapes are the stage for a miracle migration of millions.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Return of the Light - Arctic foxes raise cubs on Iceland’s volcanic shores. Finding food proves challenging until one fox learns to hunt new prey. In Shetland the otter cub strikes out alone and his mother finds a new mate. In Norway reindeer calves take their first steps.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Return to the Mara - Wildlife expert and Safari guide Jean Du Plessis is in the south of the Serengeti plains to witness the largest mass birth on the planet. Every year on the short grass plains, the wildebeest migration stops for weeks while the females give birth. Then the entire herd begins to move again, heading back north towards the Mara River, where crocodiles lie in wait for an annual feast.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Ngorongoro - Explores the Ngorogoro’s highlands and caldera on the edge of the Serengeti. The caldera is a wildlife haven that some have called a modern day Eden because of the density and diversity of its wildlife. That includes some of the last of Africa’s “tuskers.”

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Damning Truth - A dam is an engineering feat, controlling massive amounts of water. But it can also wreak havoc on the animals that call those waters home.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Growing Up Gibbon - Hoolock Gibbons are true specialists of the Indian Jungle. Living in close knit family groups, youngsters must spend up to 9 years learning all the skills required to survive alone. From finding food in unusual places, to avoiding dangerous predators and mastering the acrobatics required for a life in the trees, we follow Samar as he finally comes of age and takes his first step into the wild.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Africa's Edens - Zambia is home to three very special and different African Edens. The low, hot Luangwa River Valley, the high, dry Liuwa Plain and the cool, wet Kasanka National Park. Defined by the earth on which they sit and shaped by the seasons, each place offers something unique to the wildlife that chooses to live there.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Bonaire National Marine Park - Deep in the South Caribbean Sea, explore the protected waters of Bonaire National Marine Park, home to thriving reefs, endangered sea turtles, sprawling mangroves, and a plethora of marine life.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Florida Keys National Marine Sanctuary - This episode examines the importance of three marine habitat types in the Florida Keys including the animals within them and conservationists’ efforts to protect them.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Christmas Island - Christmas Island, over a thousand kilometres northwest of Australia’s mainland, is a speck of an island that rises out of the Indian Ocean, a tiny refuge to plants and creatures found nowhere else in the world. programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Creatures of the Night - Flying squirrels leaping through the air is quite a sight - especially for researchers who know they’re not supposed to be here. The Southern flying squirrel, typically found along the shores of Lake Erie, is now moving its territory up towards Lake Ontario and beyond thanks to warmer winters.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Bonaire National Marine Park - Deep in the South Caribbean Sea, explore the protected waters of Bonaire National Marine Park, home to thriving reefs, endangered sea turtles, sprawling mangroves, and a plethora of marine life.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Florida Keys National Marine Sanctuary - This episode examines the importance of three marine habitat types in the Florida Keys including the animals within them and conservationists’ efforts to protect them.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Christmas Island - Christmas Island, over a thousand kilometres northwest of Australia’s mainland, is a speck of an island that rises out of the Indian Ocean, a tiny refuge to plants and creatures found nowhere else in the world. programme.desc: Return of the Light - Arctic foxes raise cubs on Iceland’s volcanic shores. Finding food proves challenging until one fox learns to hunt new prey. In Shetland the otter cub strikes out alone and his mother finds a new mate. In Norway reindeer calves take their first steps.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Return to the Mara - Wildlife expert and Safari guide Jean Du Plessis is in the south of the Serengeti plains to witness the largest mass birth on the planet. Every year on the short grass plains, the wildebeest migration stops for weeks while the females give birth. Then the entire herd begins to move again, heading back north towards the Mara River, where crocodiles lie in wait for an annual feast.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Ngorongoro - Explores the Ngorogoro’s highlands and caldera on the edge of the Serengeti. The caldera is a wildlife haven that some have called a modern day Eden because of the density and diversity of its wildlife. That includes some of the last of Africa’s “tuskers.”

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Back from the Dead - Sometimes animals get a second chance. Like the majestic elk, which went extinct in Ontario thanks to habitat loss and over-aggressive hunting. But a few years ago, hundreds of elk were brought back, to re-populate the province in four different areas. Some floundered because of new, aggressive local predators. But a colony of elk in Burwash, on a former prison ground, is thriving.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Stinkers - In nature, the right stench can mean the difference between life or death. Meet nature's odor-equipped inhabitants, from vomiting grasshoppers to dung-flinging hippos, and even a flower that's adapted to smell like death.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Land of the Secret Rhino - The grasslands of Northeast India are one of the most fertile habitats on earth. Hundreds of species of tall grass flourish here, allowing one of India’s most iconic creatures to thrive… the Greater One-horned Rhino. This is one of the last places on earth where this gentle giant survives. Rani, an adult female has just had a baby, Rajah. This young rhino calf is only 3-month-old and his mom is his teacher, for the first year and half of his life. Rajah has much to learn, as he gets to grips with the world around him and everything there is to know about being a rhino.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 Ep5
programme.desc: The Valley of the Birds - Zambia’s Luangwa Valley is home to Africa’s biggest and most fearsome giants, but what really makes it special are its birds. There are over 400 different species here; each perfectly adapted to exploit every opportunity on offer.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Fraser Island - Just to the south of the Great Barrier Reef and the Tropic of Capricorn, Fraser Island lies like a sprawling lizard. Some 120 kilometers long and up to 25 kilometers wide, Fraser Island is now the largest sand island on Earth. Somehow on this nutrient-poor bed of sand life has thrived. Dingoes patrol its forests in search of wallabies while white-bellied sea eagles scour the beaches from above. From the lakes to the forests and its crystal clear streams - Fraser Island is a unique mosaic of unlikely habitats that have earned it World Heritage Status.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Children of the Storm - In Iceland only one out of six cubs has survived. Abandoned by her parents, she now has to fend for herself. The reindeer herd swim two miles across open water. In Scotland, 35,000 grey seals arrive for their annual breeding season.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Return to the Mara - Wildlife expert and Safari guide Jean Du Plessis is in the south of the Serengeti plains to witness the largest mass birth on the planet. programme.title: Supersenses 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Invisible World - Dive into a dazzling world beyond human perception, where animals use their super senses to detect light we can’t see, sound we can’t hear and even stranger forces we can’t begin to detect.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep1
programme.desc: City of Riches - Stake out the Bay Family’s lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader who’s eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Return to the Mara - Wildlife expert and Safari guide Jean Du Plessis is in the south of the Serengeti plains to witness the largest mass birth on the planet. Every year on the short grass plains, the wildebeest migration stops for weeks while the females give birth. Then the entire herd begins to move again, heading back north towards the Mara River, where crocodiles lie in wait for an annual feast.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Ngorongoro - Explores the Ngorogoro’s highlands and caldera on the edge of the Serengeti. The caldera is a wildlife haven that some have called a modern day Eden because of the density and diversity of its wildlife. That includes some of the last of Africa’s “tuskers.”

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Fraser Island - Just to the south of the Great Barrier Reef and the Tropic of Capricorn, Fraser Island lies like a sprawling lizard. Some 120 kilometers long and up to 25 kilometers wide, Fraser Island is now the largest sand island on Earth. Somehow on this nutrient-poor bed of sand life has thrived. Dingoes patrol its forests in search of wallabies while white-bellied sea eagles scour the beaches from above. From the lakes to the forests and its crystal clear streams - Fraser Island is a unique mosaic of unlikely habitats that have earned it World Heritage Status.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Children of the Storm - In Iceland only one out of six cubs has survived. Abandoned by her parents, she now has to fend for herself. The reindeer herd swim two miles across open water. In Scotland, 35,000 grey seals arrive for their annual breeding season.

programme.title: Supersenses 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Invisible World - Dive into a dazzling world beyond human perception, where animals use their super senses to detect light we can’t see, sound we can’t hear and even stranger forces we can’t begin to detect.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep1
programme.desc: City of Riches - Stake out the Bay Family’s lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader who’s eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Land of the Secret Rhino - The grasslands of Northeast India are one of the most fertile habitats on earth. Hundreds of species of tall grass flourish here, allowing one of India’s most iconic creatures to thrive… the Greater One-horned Rhino. This is one of the last places on earth where this gentle giant survives. Rani, an adult female has just had a baby, Rajah. This young rhino calf is only 3-month-old and his mom is his teacher, for the first year and half of his life. Rajah has much to learn, as he gets to grips with the world around him and everything there is to know about being a rhino.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Stinkers - In nature, the right stench can mean the difference between life or death. Meet nature's odor-equipped inhabitants, from vomiting grasshoppers to dung-flinging hippos, and even a flower that's adapted to smell like death.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Return to the Mara - Wildlife expert and Safari guide Jean Du Plessis is in the south of the Serengeti plains to witness the largest mass birth on the planet. Every year on the short grass plains, the wildebeest migration stops for weeks while the females give birth. Then the entire herd begins to move again, heading back north towards the Mara River, where crocodiles lie in wait for an annual feast.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Ngorongoro - Explores the Ngorogoro’s highlands and caldera on the edge of the Serengeti. The caldera is a wildlife haven that some have called a modern day Eden because of the density and diversity of its wildlife. That includes some of the last of Africa’s “tuskers.”

programme.title: Stormborn 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Children of the Storm - In Iceland only one out of six cubs has survived. Abandoned by her parents, she now has to fend for herself. The reindeer herd swim two miles across open water. In Scotland, 35,000 grey seals arrive for their annual breeding season.

programme.title: Supersenses 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Invisible World - Dive into a dazzling world beyond human perception, where animals use their super senses to detect light we can’t see, sound we can’t hear and even stranger forces we can’t begin to detect.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep1
programme.desc: City of Riches - Stake out the Bay Family’s lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader who’s eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Winged Weirdos - One uses a mustache to attract mates and another has a bill so big, it needs special vertebrae to carry it. Learn how nature's flying iconoclasts have evolved their appearance in order to survive.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Ugly - Gawk at some of the world’s ugliest animals who owe their survival to the adaptations that made them so strange. A pudgy wolf eel, naked mole rat, and hideous sea lamprey may be superficially grotesque, but they’re evolutionarily amazing.

programme.title: Colombia's Wild Coast 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Snake Prison Island - Gorgona was once home to Colombia’s Alcatraz. Modelled on Nazi concentration camps, prisoners dreamt of escape. See the island’s stunning wildlife through the eyes of a convict on the run, the monkeys, snakes and sloths who’ve now reclaimed the land.

programme.title: Life's Journey 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Life Begins - For the first few weeks of life, the world is a frightening place. Danger lurks around every corner. It pays to be alert. Whether predator or prey. Any day might be your last. The race is on to grow up fast- for even the largest animals are vulnerable to attack.

programme.title: Life's Journey 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life's Lessons - If young animals survive until adulthood, the chances for survival are greatly increased - but many challenges face them before they can strike out on their own. Some have months to grow-up; other have decades – but all, have lots to learn along the way. From getting to grips with their bodies and learning to feed themselves, to practicing fighting skills and learning how to form friendships. There are many hurdles along the way, but every small success could mean the difference between life and death.

programme.title: Life's Journey 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Life's Legacies - For every species on earth the right to mate is the purpose of life. Passing on your genes to the next generation is every animal’s legacy. But it’s not easy, it can be a struggle to find a mate and then a fight to gain access. Only the strongest and most determined will win at Luangwa’s mating game.

programme.title: Kingdom of the Tide
programme.desc: Kingdom of the Tide - Low tide exposes a band of shore called the intertidal zone. It’s a place of stunning extremes, attacked by hurricane force waves and exposed to baking heat. Creatures here have evolved in countless bizarre ways. Scientists explore this alien realm.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Collisions - Observe the natural and human forces that have shaped Ningaloo Reef, Cape Range, and Exmouth Gulf with Tim, Traditional Owners, and other experts. Check out a million-year-old fossil reef, a gargantuan fish, and a ray that packs quite a punch.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Connections - Follow scientists and Traditional Owners as they map out ecological links, migratory pathways, and interspecies bonds that conserve Ningaloo’s biodiversity. Frolic with whales, float among seaweed islands, and see archaeologists nix a settler myth.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Choices - Learn how Ningaloo’s conservation miracle could inspire humans to pull the planet back from the brink of climatic destruction. Visit an abandoned whaling station and other ruins that show we have the tools, if only we can find the will to change.

programme.title: The Ocean's Greatest Feast
programme.desc: The Ocean's Greatest Feast - Get a front-row seat to the planet’s biggest biomass migration, the annual 1,000-mile sardine run along South Africa’s east coast. See billions of these tiny fish run a gauntlet of hungry predators, including stealthy seals and dive-bombing gannets.

programme.title: Turtle Beach
programme.desc: Turtle Beach - Locals call it the ‘arribada’, or ‘arrival’. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs. In Turtle Beach, new discoveries abound, as Canadian naturalist and cameraman Hugo Kitching follows a team of international scientists on a groundbreaking expedition to uncover the mysteries of this rare phenomenon.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Winged Weirdos - One uses a mustache to attract mates and another has a bill so big, it needs special vertebrae to carry it. Learn how nature's flying iconoclasts have evolved their appearance in order to survive.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Asia's Longest Day - See how creatures from the Tibetan plateau, to the lush rainforests of Thailand, to Vietnam’s twisted mangroves, survive four extra hours of daylight once a year, searching for food, fighting for dominance and raising their families.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep38
programme.desc: A Star Is Hatched / Say Cheese - After stumbling into Finly’s music performance, Archibald’s unique sound leads to a hit record. But as the pressures of fame and success loom over the band, they struggle to recreate that "Archibald sound" and recapture lightning in a bottle. / When the Strutters need a family portrait, they meet a burnt out photographer named Randy. After accidentally wrecking his studio, Archibald decides he’s going to help Randy rekindle his passion for photography.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep25
programme.desc: The Tide Is Nigh / Rain Gran - Eep takes up death-guarding at the watering hole, but finds out it's more mundane than she thought. Grug and Sandy get competitive when town members encroach on their treasure hunting/Gran convinces Grug that she controls the weather, but the power goes to her head when all of Ahhh! Valley believes her. Thunk tries to overcome his fear of thunderstorms.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep24
programme.desc: Lucky And The Patchwork Plan - Lucky and her friends try to prevent Aunt Cora from leaving Miradero.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep24
programme.desc: Can't Harvey Wait / Bring It Prawn - Lucretia recounts three amazing tales of Harvey Girls fan fiction. Audrey must partner with Zoe in a shrimp-sponsored sibling beauty pageant.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep24
programme.desc: Dome Sweet Dome / My Pet Clamsquatch - Chet accidentally trades all of the town's tomatoes to the devious Ace Gecko and the FAST crew has to outsmart the lizard in order to get them back. // Skidmark has been secretly keeping a clamsquatch as a pet and it's up to the crew to protect the creature from a nefarious secret organization.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep4
programme.desc: Gopher it! / A Glamping We Will Go - When a pesky gopher gets in the way of Fawna making her famous veggie stew, Niah learns to not let a bad experience, get in the way of doing good. / When the inexperienced Rona has to step in for Donna, the team makes sure everyone has the best camping trip ever.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep38
programme.desc: A Star Is Hatched / Say Cheese - After stumbling into Finly’s music performance, Archibald’s unique sound leads to a hit record. But as the pressures of fame and success loom over the band, they struggle to recreate that "Archibald sound" and recapture lightning in a bottle. / When the Strutters need a family portrait, they meet a burnt out photographer named Randy. After accidentally wrecking his studio, Archibald decides he’s going to help Randy rekindle his passion for photography.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep32
programme.desc: Scrap to the Future / Bringing Up Birdy - As she’s preparing for the Hearts & Crafts Festival, Poppy finds a mysterious scrapbook that seems to predict the future – and it shows the festival being a disaster! She and Branch set out to prevent the predictions from coming true. But is there a downside to being over prepared?/When a nest full of just-hatched baby birds imprint on Branch, he must overcome his fear of birds in order to raise them right.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep14
programme.desc: Bumbleberry/Leaf's Still Cool - Rocksy discovers that Verry Berry is fascinated with bees, but when Berry innocently cosplays as a bee, she disappears into the hive and doesn't emerge. / After reuniting with an old friend, Leaf goes to great, unsafe lengths to prove that he's still a cool daredevil.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep32
programme.desc: Escape Goat - Dulcinea and the entire town must save the day after Puss attempts to rescue Uli with the help of El Guante Blanco, Golem, Goodsword and the Dutchess.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep19
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch - Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep63
programme.desc: Snuffnut - Tuff fakes his own death to make room for Throk, but when Ruff tries to train the Changewing that she thinks ate Tuff, a flock of angry Changewings come for the dragon

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep64
programme.desc: Searching For Oswald And Chicken - On a search for Dagur's dad, Hiccup and Dagur encounter vicious Grim Gnashers, and Tuff's search for a missing Chicken leads him to discover she has a second family

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep13
programme.desc: Six Well-Placed Kittens - When Bootsy's plan of 6 strategically placed kittens brings the whole town down, Mega Fat is forced to team with Boss Baby

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep14
programme.desc: As the Diaper Changes - When Grandma Templeton comes to stay, she forces Boss Baby into Tim's room but they struggle to be roommates, and meanwhile, Baby Corp's new CEO trusts Boss Baby with the new Stinkless Serum

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep11
programme.desc: Unholy Dragon Returns to the Mountains - Jindiao takes Po and the kids hostage in an attempt to locate the Wellspring

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep12
programme.desc: Sacrifice at the Edge of Time - The kids are desperate to get back and help their fellow Panda Villagers, and Po decides he must figure out a way to defeat Jindiao before he controls the world

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep21
programme.desc: The Case Of The Knocked Down Fences - While Hoof is about to do his obstacle course, he finds all the fences knocked down. He blames Bling, who was jealous of the lucky wings he wears on his hoofs, but Bling assures she's got nothing to do with it ! Noddy investigates to settle their argument.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep22
programme.desc: The Case Of The Unfinished Building - Strange accidents keep happening on the building site. Clockwork Mouse is convinced that someone is trying to stop them finishing the building. Noddy investigates and finds out things aren't quite as they seem...

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep23
programme.desc: The Case Of The Damaged Magic Box - Pat-Pat is doing a magic show but she discovers her magic box is broken. Noddy investigates: Who broke the magic box? He needs to find out soon so that Pat Pat's show can take place.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep24
programme.desc: The Case Of The Lost Pirates - Armed with a brand new sat-nav from Fuse, the Pirates head off on The Pirate Challenge, sailing all around Toyland. But when they fail to arrive at their first stop in Toy Green, Noddy investigates what's happened. He must set the Pirates back on course to complete the challenge by the end of the day.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep47
programme.desc: Raa Raa's New Games - Raa Raa is in a playful mood and sets off to find his friends. Together they incorporate everybody's game, to make one noisy, fun filled new game.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep48
programme.desc: Raa Raa Can Do It - Raa Raa is in an overly helpful mood and his other friends start to feel excluded… will Raa Raa realise the error of his ways and let the others help too?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep49
programme.desc: Crocky's Coconut - Crocky has entrusted Raa Raa with his very special coconut to look after. Raa Raa does his very best to keep it safe. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep50
programme.desc: Kings and Queens Of The Jungle - Topsy takes a game of Kings and Queens too seriously and starts to boss the other animals around. The animals don't want to play with her anymore, can Topsy help them change their mind?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep21
programme.desc: Mum's The Word - Christine (Big Chris' mum) is visiting Silver hatch. As is Mamma Mia… serious competition ensues!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep22
programme.desc: How The Hatch Was Won - Tin Top is feeling homesick so Big Chris tries to cheer him up. But who could that pesky varmint causing trouble on the track be?!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep23
programme.desc: Go Gadget James And Maxi - Maxi is jealous of all of James' gadgets, or more precisely, the attention the other cars give him. He persuades Molecom to devise some gadgets for him… with hilarious results

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep24
programme.desc: Mr Carburettor Or Bust - Mr Carburettor has commissioned a bust of himself for Silver Hatch. Disaster strikes when it is dropped, Big Chris tries to make amends, while Marsha distracts Mr Carburettor and the reporter

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep11
programme.desc: Merry Scary Christmas / Time Waits For No Ghost - Merry Scary Christmas It's Christmas and Casper wants to spend the holiday with his human pal, Jimmy. Time Waits for No Ghost When Casper discovers a clock that can stop time, everyone wants to use it for his or her own purpose.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep12
programme.desc: Ghostbust A Move / My Fair Harpy - Ghostbust a Move When Jimmy's dad decides to move the family away from Deedstown, Casper and his friends vow to stop Mr. Bradley from selling their house. My Fair Harpy The Winter Chill Dance is coming up and Ra is determined to be king.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep4
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Vexing Villainy of the Vile Vimpire - When Erica makes fun of George and Harold’s latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep5
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Terrifying Perilous Misfortune of the T.P. Mummy - After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep1
programme.desc: Scooter Buskie - The world’s worst baby is on the loose and Boss Baby, Tim and the team must find him before he turns the whole neighborhood against babies

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep2
programme.desc: Cat's in the Cradle - When an unexpected kitten shows up on Boss Baby’s doorstep, they go head to head against the feline enemy

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep77
programme.desc: The Moving Finger Writes - Puss and the gang attempt to find Sino for help to stop the earthquakes and end up on a dangerous journey to “The Forbidden Citadel”

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep25
programme.desc: Peril Patch / Sibling Quibbling - When a mysterious, dangerous mini-golf course blooms in Troll Village, the Trolls must figure out how to destroy it/Satin's relationship with Chenille is tested when she befriends an extreme sports-loving Troll

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep51
programme.desc: I, Maurice - When Maurice learns that he isn't a lemur like everyone else, he sets off on a journey to find his Aye-Aye parents and sister Brosalind

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep25
programme.desc: Lucky And Her New Family Part 1 - When El Circo Dos Grillos comes to town, Lucky and Spirit learn circus tricks.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep25
programme.desc: Norway Out - Odlulu is on the hunt for the Wind Key so she can use it as the world's greatest hair dryer. But the Wind Key is too powerful for Odlulu to handle, so Wally, Wenda and Whitebeard head to Norway to locate the key before Odlulu can find it. Luckily, Whitebeard is a master sailor and can guide the Wanderers through the fjords. Unfortunately, Whitebeard also gets majorly seasick.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep5
programme.desc: Pupcakes \ Stink or Swim - When Tag discovers that Scooch is a great baker, she encourages him to start a pupcake stand. But when Tag rounds up more customers than Scooch is prepared to handle, Scooch can’t keep up with the demand. \ Tag and Scooch’s race to pick up the most trash on Pawston Beach is thwarted by Frank and Beans, who just want to make more of a mess.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep5
programme.desc: The Amazing Donna / Bye, Bye Boardie - When Donna decides to show off her not-so-flashy skills as a magician at the Community Center talent show, the Zenkos must do everything they can to save her act from becoming an embarrassing disaster. / After Sam’s favorite skateboard accidentally gets put in with donations Mr. Tanaka is collecting for a fundraiser, the team is led on a merry chase as the skateboard passes from one Harmony Harbor denizen to another.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep5
programme.desc: Heavy Metal - The Rescue Riders get stuck in a cave with their rival, Magnus, during a race to find a new source of an important mineral.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep9
programme.desc: The Case Of Deltoid's Strange Behaviour - Smartysaurus is upset because her best friend, Deltoid, keeps calling her a monster and running away from her. Noddy decides to investigate and find out why Deltoid's behaving so strangely. He soon discovers that Deltoid has lost all his memories and doesn't recognise any of his friends anymore. It takes all Noddy's powers of deduction and gathering evidence on the WhoWhatWhere Tablet to realise that Deltoid has lost his memory chip! All he has to do now is stop Deltoid trying to trap Smartysaurus long enough to refit the chip and restore his memories. Good luck Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep10
programme.desc: The Case Of The Slippery Stage - Pat-Pat is meant to be giving a baton twirling display at the Town Hall but the stage is covered with sticky stuff. Clockwork Mouse and Carlton can clear up the sticky stuff but Noddy must investigate to find out who was trying to spoil Pat-Pat's show or they might do it again! Using his wwwbook to follow all the clues from polishing day at the Fairy Castle to Fairy Coco swapping the polish for a ribbon, Noddy works out it was Pat-Pat who tried to delay her show. She wanted to practise more! Noddy and Bumpy help Pat-Pat to feel confident about the performance and she gives a great display. Thanks, Noddy!

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep27
programme.desc: A Tiny Problem / Changing Lanes - When Archibald accidentally shrinks himself and Loy, they must work together and brave a challenging course through their giant house. / In an effort to make the bowling league championship more balanced, Arch and Brock switch teams (and families), spending a day in each other’s (bowling) shoes.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep26
programme.desc: Dawn Of The Broods Part 1 & Part 2 - Grug convinces The Croods to go on vacation, and they find a new family, The Broods, who live in a solitary utopia too good to be true/The Croods must escape and warn Ahhh! Valley before it's too late.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep25
programme.desc: Lucky And Her New Family Part 1 - When El Circo Dos Grillos comes to town, Lucky and Spirit learn circus tricks.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep25
programme.desc: Hover, May I board With Danger / Free Gilly - Audrey's plan to try out Stu's new hover board backfires. Billy the Skunk learns a lesson in a musical episode from the animals point of view.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep25
programme.desc: Hard Luck Hardcase / Bee Story - Hardcase follows the crew to the desert and goes to extreme lengths attempting to finally get his revenge on Turbo. // White Shadow loses his good-luck charm and spirals into a streak of terrible luck and the crew must help him find it before things get any worse.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Frenzied Farts of Flabby Flabulous - George and Harold create a comic book about their gym teacher, but after a freak accident turns fantasy into reality, the best friends must run from his revenge

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep3
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Horrible Hostilities of the Homework Hydra - When George and Harold go back in time to stop the invention of homework, they realize they also eliminated the most important thing in the world: comic books

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep5
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Terrifying Perilous Misfortune of the T.P. Mummy - After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep8
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Jarring Jerkiness of the Judge J.O.R.T.S - George and Harold transform their new Spanish teacher into a superhero after they feel guilty for pranking him, but their teacher loves it and gets carried away

programme.desc: Copy Cat - When Puss accidentally agrees to ride for both Artephius and the orphans in the annual San Lorenzo horse race, his twin Puss Dos enters the race.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep20
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Blitzkrieg of the Bothersome Butt-erflies - As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep21
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Problematic Pandemonium of the Punishing Plungerina - After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep25
programme.desc: The Case Of The Torn-Out Pages - Someone's ripped out the final pages of Queen Sparklewings Fairytale book! Who could it be ? Noddy needs to find out fast and restore the pages to the book or the Queen's special fairytale storytelling will be cancelled.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep26
programme.desc: The Case Of The Bird That Can't Fly - Noddy finds a bird in Pat-Pat's Treehouse that doesn't seem to be able to fly. He decides to investigate: how can they help the bird to fly? Noddy finds out that the bird can fly – it just doesn't want to. But why ?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep27
programme.desc: The Case Of The Clockwork Mouse Mystery - Everyone in Toyland is excited about the first ever Winter Light Festival - except its organiser, Clockwork Mouse who is moving at super fast speed. Noddy investigates why she's acting so strangely. He works out that she's been trying to move at triple speed to get everything sorted in time. Noddy helps her realise that she doesn't have to do all the festival preparations on her own. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep28
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Smartysaurus - For the Night of the Stars, Noddy invites all his friends at home to look at the stars through his telescope. Smartysaurus will bring a map of the stars so everyone can spot them. But when the party starts, Smartysaurus hasn't arrived. Noddy investigates and finds out his big friend couldn't fit through his small front door so she'd shrunk herself! Noddy has to help Smartysaurus get back to her proper size and find a way for everyone to enjoy the Night of the Stars together. Good job, Noddy.

programme.desc: Raa Raa Goes Hunting - Raa Raa has lost his toothbrush and sets off to find it. Where can it be?

programme.desc: Race to Eagle Rock - Blaze brings all of his monster truck pals to VelocityVille for a wild race to the top of Eagle Rock! But Crusher will stop at nothing to beat race car Blaze and friends, setting traps to slow them down.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep714
programme.desc: Pups Save a Rocket Roller Skater / Pups Save Ryder's Surprise - A mix-up delivery leads to Ms. Marjorie and Danny speeding out of control in Adventure Bay. Now the Pups must rescue them. // Ryder's present ends up in the jungle and Carlos is trapped in a Jungle Gym. It's up to the Pups to save them.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep715
programme.desc: Pups Save the Marooned Mayors / Pups Save the Game Show - While out ice fishing in the North Country, Mayors Goodway and Humdinger, along with Chickaletta, get stuck in an ice crevasse. // The Wingnuts' farm plays host to a rootin' tootin Game Show hosted by Cowgirl Beryl!

programme.title: Deer Squad S2 Ep210
programme.desc: The supersized sunflower / Moontaker - Ricardo hosts a sunflower competition, but Lola is worried hers is ill - surely a little Wood Power will perk it up? // Lady Fluffpot wants a statue made of moon rock, but the deer know that messing with the moon is a bad idea!

programme.title: Deer Squad S2 Ep218
programme.desc: A Hole Lot of Trouble - Bobbi gets carried away while digging for ground nuts and puts the forest and its residents in real danger.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Paddington Finds a Hobby / Paddington and the Stamp - Paddington does not have a hobby like all of the Browns, but Mrs. Brown finds out what Paddington is good at. // Paddington gets his arm stuck in a post box after accidentally using Mr. Gruber's rare Penny Black stamp on his letter to Aunt Lucy.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Paddington and the Wardrobe / Paddington Helps with Homework - Paddington is accidentally delivered inside a wardrobe to Mr. Curry's house and must get out before he is discovered. // Paddington tries to help Judy with her geography homework and ends up being the subject of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep214
programme.desc: Recycling - Peppa and George help Mummy Pig tidy up the breakfast things. Mummy Pig tells them that bottles go into a special green box to be recycled. Old newspapers go in a red box and tins go in a blue box. Peppa and George have fun filling the boxes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep215
programme.desc: Daddy Pig's Office - Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pig’s office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbit’s job is all about numbers, Mrs Cat‘s job is all about drawing shapes on the computer, and Daddy Pig’s job is complicated.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep216
programme.desc: Pirate Island - Grandpa and Granny Pig are taking Peppa, George and their friends to Pirate Island. Grandpa shows how to use his metal detector to find treasures and they all build a big sandcastle.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep217
programme.desc: Jumble Sale - Peppa’s playgroup is holding a jumble sale to raise money for a new roof and Madame Gazelle asks everyone to bring something to sell. Peppa and her friends bring in an old toy but they soon realise that favourite toys can be hard to let go of.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S6 Ep603
programme.desc: A Giant Harvest Day! - Holiday Cooks Molly and Gil, on a mission to save the town's Harvest Day (Thanksgiving) feast, must retrieve a Golden Tomato from magical Tall Tale Farms. But first, their food knowledge is tested by three guardians!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep310
programme.desc: Blue's Storytime with Camila - We dive deeper into American Sign Language and the Deaf community. Camila the librarian wants to tell a story with us using ASL, but what story? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep311
programme.desc: Tickety's Big Musical Morning - Good Morning! We celebrate morning routines with Tickety as we sing a brand-new wakeup song and play a timely game of Blue's Clues to figure out what special time is coming up.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep207
programme.desc: Bonnie's Mom / The Ocelot's Tale - Santi and crew must team up with Bonnie to rescue her mom, pirate Billie Bones, from her sneaky first mate! // A fun sleepover in Larimar's Museum turns into an adventure when one of the pieces of art comes to life.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep94
programme.desc: Day Trip - The Teletubbies go on a day trip to the Hidey Hup. They take turns on The Tubby Bouncy, The Tubby Slidey and The Tubby Spinny before they go on The Tubby Uppy Downy together.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S4) Ep19
programme.desc: Fox - Dee encourages a friend to say 'fox' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. Today, we see a red fox, a furry fox, a fast fox and a fantastic fox.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep18
programme.desc: What Goes Up - When Mo's kite gets stuck up on an office roof, the team rescue it in a down-to-earth way.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S2) Ep24
programme.desc: It's Time to See the Planets - Captain Chloe's adventures through space inspire JoJo and Gran Gran, who make a visit to the space centre to see the planets.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep52
programme.desc: The Greatest Gift - Monty has no money to buy a gift for his mum. He wonders if a gift has to be large or cost money to be special.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep51
programme.desc: Round and Round - Jeanie says going round in circles won't help find a missing key, but Monty isn't so sure.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep50
programme.desc: Grandad - Grandad is supposed to be resting, but when Bluey and Bingo go to visit him, he makes a run for it with the kids and takes them on a madcap adventure into the bush.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep37
programme.desc: The Traffic Badge - It's a hot day so Duggee is treating the Squirrels to a trip to the tropical lake. It's particularly busy out today and there's a traffic jam! Thank goodness Duggee has his traffic badge. He knows what to do!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep36
programme.desc: The Water Badge - The squirrels learn all about where water comes from, and their journey takes them from the sea and back to the kitchen sink and another drink of water. Wow! Water is amazing!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep35
programme.desc: The Brave Banana Badge - When thunder and lightning scares the squirrels, Duggee teaches them about bravery.

programme.desc: Baby Race - Mum reminisces about Bluey and Judo as babies. Bluey learnt to roll over first, but Judo was the first to crawl, so then it became a race to see who was going to walk first.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep48
programme.desc: Typewriter - Bluey, Snickers, and Winton are on their way to ask Calypso for help with their problems, when they are ambushed by the Terriers and use their unique talents to get past.

programme.desc: Taking the lead - Since 2015, women in every country in the world have officially had the right to vote. It’s been a long road to this point. Attitudes towards female politicians are still largely characterized by deeply ingrained stereotypes. So how do they cope?

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Pavlovich vs. Blaydes
programme.desc: Main Event - Hoping that one more win will take them to a world title shot, Top Five heavyweight contenders Curtis Blaydes and Sergei Pavlovich have the opportunity to make that statement in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas on April 22. A swarming wrestler who has stopped Chris Daukaus and Tom Aspinall in back to back fights, Blaydes is in prime form entering his spring showdown with Russia’s Pavlovich, who has won five in a row, all by knockout, over the likes of Derrick Lewis and Tai Tuivasa

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: Wish You Were Here - UFC Unleashed features the best fights from the UFC archives, all in one show. Unleashed brings you the big fights that you missed or want to see all over again.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts
programme.desc: Black History Month: Epic Knockouts - UFC Ultimate Knockouts brings you some of the most devastating finishes ever seen inside the Octagon.From one-punch knockouts to highlight reel kicks, you’ll seethe UFCs’s biggest names in their most memorable performances.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep7
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep12
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep12
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.desc: An enhanced replay of the sport’s biggest fights, featuring never-before-seen footage from specialty cams.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2308
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: CryptoData Motorrad Grand Prix von Österreich Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The MotoGP World Championship returned to Austria in 2016 after a break of 18 years, with the country hosting a motorcycle Grand Prix event at the Red Bull Ring in Spielberg - the last time being in 1997. Austria’s first Grand Prix took place in 1971 at the Salzburgring circuit, which hosted Grand Prix racing on a total of 22 occasions, until 1994. The Spielberg Red Bull Ring is beautifully situated in the Murtal region of Styria and was originally built in 1969, then known as the Österreichring. In 1996 it was rebuilt with the track-layout it still has today, and hosted Grand Prix events for two years as the ‘A1-Ring’, before being reopened as the ‘Red Bull Ring’ in 2011.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2308
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Song vs. Simon
programme.desc: Prelims - With five consecutive victories, including back-to-back finishes of Raphael Assuncao and Jack Shore, Ricky Simon put himself on the fast track to a shot at the bantamweight title, but on April 29, he will have to make his case even stronger by getting past Chinese contender Song Yadong in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. Winner of three of his last four, with knockouts of Julio Arce and Marlon Moraes, Song can change the direction of a fight with one punch, and he plans on letting Simon know that as soon as the Octagon door shuts
